query.name: findAllProtocolActionTypes
query.sql: SELECT irb_protocol_action_type_id, label FROM irb_protocol_action_type ORDER BY 1

query.name: findIRBStudyByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT irb_study_id, study_id, cdc_irb_protocol_number, version1_protocol_date, protocol_officer, submitted_cdc_irb, approval_by_cdc_irb, cdc_irb_expiration_date FROM public.irb_study WHERE irb_study_id=?

query.name: findIRBSiteBySiteId
query.sql: SELECT irb_site_id, site_id, version_number, site_relies_on_cdc_irb, is_1572, cdc_irb_protocol_version_date, local_irb_approved_protocol, cdc_received_local_documents, site_consent_package_send_to_cdc_irb, initial_cdc_irb_approval, crb_approval_to_enroll, irb_approval, expiration_date, active, "comments" FROM public.irb_site WHERE site_id=?
